<<> AzureBlade knew he had worried her.
> 
> AzureBlade: Please relax. You need to fear nothing from me. Perhaps I 
> can help you find out who you are. I have some kind of talents that i 
> could use. I can dive and help your spark find its way. Even if it 
> turns out you are a Predacon, I will not hurt you nor will I try to 
> modify your spark. I have sworn it and I still intend to uphold my 
> word. But if you prefer to find another, I can help you find one.>>

"You...could help me?" Mistra hesistated...would she want someone to be doing 
that to her spark? Someone she barely knew just yet..? He had sworn not to 
hurt her, true, and she believed him. A conclusion came to her.

"Any help to find my identity would be appreaciated...however, not yet. If 
the offer would still be available to me later I mean...but for now, I'd be 
most grateful if I could join your side...for the time at least?" Feeling as 
though she hadn't provided enough of a reason, she added "To see if anyone on 
whatever side I was on cares enough to choose and come after me, as you did. 
If not, I would gladly stay with your faction."

--part1_92.21068811.2991f49d_boundary
